amendment.description: Amendment sought to require USACE to contract with private sector surveying and mapping firms, wherever practical, in performance of surveying and mapping services and activities for Corps projects. Amendment also sought to require the Secretary to issue agency guidance to encourage use of the private sector for surveying and mapping services and require a process to provide oversight of the performance of compliance with the guidance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.
